userStories.title: Achieve 80% test coverage on backend services
userStories.description:
ERROR LOGGING REQUIREMENTS:
- Log method entry/exit at DEBUG level with parameters (sanitized)
- Log all exceptions with full stack trace and context
- Include entity IDs (project_id, page_id) in all service logs
- Log validation failures with field names and rejected values
- Log state transitions (phase changes) at INFO level
- Add timing logs for operations >1 second

RAILWAY DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS:
- Tests must work with DATABASE_URL env var
- Use test database, not production
- CI should mirror Railway environment where possible
